summary: Educational language learning app for kids, inspired by and aiming to improve upon Lingokids
architectural_notes: Internet Identity integration for authentication with support for major identity providers (Google, Apple, Microsoft)
Guest/demo mode for unauthenticated users to explore app functionality
Backend integration required for persisting user progress, quiz scores, and achievements
known_issues: Deployment issue: app not accessible ("No live apps yet" error shown)
Authentication system not functional - users unable to sign up/login
Progress tracking system (AR-4) requires backend implementation to persist data for logged-in users

existing_features.title: Create a kid-friendly educational language learning application with interactive lessons and activities
Implement vocabulary learning modules with words categorized by topics (animals, colors, numbers, family, food)
Create interactive quiz games where children can match words to images or hear pronunciations
Add reward system with stars or badges earned after completing activities to encourage continued learning

Design a vibrant, playful visual theme with warm, inviting colors (oranges, yellows, greens), rounded shapes, large friendly typography, and animated elements that create a joyful, engaging atmosphere for young learners without overwhelming them
Render generated images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated for vocabulary illustrations, category icons, and reward badges
Implement Internet Identity authentication system that allows users to log in securely using their existing accounts (Google, Apple, Microsoft) through Internet Identity integration
Add Guest Mode that allows users to explore and use all application features without requiring authentication or account creation
Connect frontend progress tracking components to the backend storage system so that authenticated users' progress data is loaded on login and updated after each activity completion

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement a progress tracking system that saves completed lessons and quiz scores per user
Add Internet Identity authentication system supporting Google, Apple, Microsoft accounts
Implement Guest Mode allowing users to explore app features without login
Fix deployment issue preventing the application from being accessible, ensuring the app deploys correctly and is reachable at the deployment URL without showing 'No live apps yet' error
Implement backend progress tracking system that persists completed lessons, quiz scores, earned badges, and activity completion status for authenticated users
